Side Effects: My blood pressure went down in about three weeks_ but I began to cough after about a week and eventually coughed so much and so hard my ribs were sore.  I've stopped taking it.
Comments: I have read in some sources that a cough in these circumstances is often accompanied by other problems that are not so obvious.  I'm no expert_ but it's worth asking your doctor about if you have a cough from this medication and s/he recommends you continue it anyway.
